personalInfo.education: San Diego State University (2006, Public Administration)

tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T133 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.curYearHigh: Played 19 Web.com Tour events, making eight cuts. Had three top 25s, includingincluded two top 10s. Finished 77th on the money list...Best showing of the year came in his third start when he earned a T8 at the Cartagena de Indias at Karibana Championship in March. Fired a 67 in the first round. Was two off the pace heading into the final round after rounds of 71-72. Double-bogeyed two of his final three holes leading to a 75 on Sunday...Second top 10 came at The Rex Hospital Open in May. After an opening-round 67, fired 65-68 and was bogey-free over those 36 holes. Remained blemish-free during the front nine of the final round. After going out in 33, struggled on the inward nine with three bogeys, offset by three birdies. Posted a 68 on Sunday to place T4...Was one of two players (w/Scott Parel) who began the Regular Season finale in Portland inside the top 75 and fell out. He was on the bubble at No. 75 coming entering the week. Shot 69-76 to miss the cut, then had to wait through the weekend only to confirm the inevitable, that he would not make the Finals...On the PGA TOUR, Monday qualified for the Northern Trust Open at Riviera CC in February. Shot 74-79 and missed the cut.
tourBios.carHigh:
Has played Gateway, Golden State and eGolf Tours.

 2014: Finished T43 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.

 2008: Played in his first PGA TOUR event. Missed the cut at the Northern Trust Open.
tourBios.personal: Attended Green Valley High School in Henderson, Nev...Favorite courses played are Winged Foot and San Francisco GC...Lucky charm is a "courage" rock his girlfriend gave him in 2004...Favorites include San Diego Chargers, TV show "Sons of Anarchy, " the book The Power of Now and the restaurant Del Friscos...Dream foursome would include his dad, Arnold Palmer and Ben Hogan.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T4th in 2015 at the Rex Hospital Open.
